titleStmt.title: The report of the Committee for receiving informations concerning the Popish plot upon the complaint of Mr. Peter Norris presented to the House of Commons, upon Thursday the 9th day of Decemb. 1680.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons. Committee to Receive Informations Concerning the Popish Plot.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John Wright and Richard Chiswell,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
